1.title: Cowgirl Lesson and Rockfish Sandwiches in Orange County

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Stephanie "cowgirls up" and takes a horse riding lesson. She rounds up some help from her instructor who helps her make grilled rock fish sandwiches.

2.title: Rock Climbing and Mahi Mahi Tacos in Malibu

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Foregoing celebrity sightseeing, Stephanie rocks out with her instructor and climbs Point Dume, a popular rock-climbing site located in Malibu. She prepares for her adventure with a personalized shopping trip to REI and a quick stop at a local seafood market to buy ingredients for a marvelous meal of mahi mahi tacos.

3.title: Flying Trapeze Lesson and Shrimp Fajitas in Las Vegas

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: In this high-flying episode, Stephanie takes a flying trapeze lesson with one of Las Vegas' best cirque instructors. After a trip to American Apparel to shop for wardrobe, Whole Foods Market and the new farmers market to shop for ingredients, she makes a Southwestern-inspired meal of shrimp fajitas.

4.title: Archery Lesson and Smoked Salmon Wraps in Pasadena

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Stephanie takes her love for the story of Robin Hood to an extreme by taking an archery lesson from one Hollywood's best marksman. After shopping for the perfect outfit and ingredients for the lunch that she'll make for her instructor, she gets fitted for her bow and the adventure begins!

5.title: Brazilian Samba Lesson and Lobster Cocktail in Los Angeles

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Stephanie puts years of childhood dance lessons to work and explores the energetic world of Brazilian Samba dancing! After an afternoon of shopping in Downtown Los Angeles for an outfit and fresh lobster, she takes her dance lesson then prepares a decadent meal of lobster & avocado cocktail for her instructor.

6.title: Dogsledding and Gourmet Picnic in Banquise Val-des-Lacs, Quebec

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Putting aside her childhood fear of dogs, Stephanie takes a dogsledding adventure in the Laurentian mountains of Quebec, Canada. To prepare for the extreme cold environment, she shops at Mountain Equipment Co-Op for her wardrobe. She manages to confront her fear and has the ride of a lifetime!

7.title: Ice Fishing in Old Montreal and Fresh Grilled Walleye in Montreal, Canada

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: After years of successful fishing in the Pacific ocean off California's west coat, Stephanie decides to try her hand at ice fishing on the frozen St. Lawrence River in Vieux Montréal (Old Montréal). With bold plans to catch a fish for lunch, she shops at Jean-Talon market for the accompanying ingredients.

8.title: Food Tour of Montreal!

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: After days of taking on wild adventures in the region of Quebec, Stephanie takes a day off to simply enjoy the food and sights of Montréal. But, when she visits beautiful Mont Royal she can't resist renting a pair of skates and a sled for an afternoon of adventure!

9.title: SCUBA Diving in the Sea of Cortez and Roasted Lobster in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Stephanie heads to beautiful Cabo San Lucas, Mexico to fulfill a lifelong dream of SCUBA diving in "the world's aquarium." After an afternoon of shopping for her swimsuit and taking the PADI Discover Diving exam, she heads out to the Sea of Cortez with her dive team, and later makes and lunch of roasted Caribbean lobster!

10.title: Snorkeling with Sea Lions and Mango Habenero Ceviche in Espiritu Santo Island, Mexico

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: After working up an appetite shopping at a local farmers market, trying on wet suits and diving in one of the world's most beautiful locations, Catalina Island, Stephanie shows her diving instructor some appreciation by cooking up a fabulous lunch of shark tacos, tropical pico de gallo and a refreshing hibiscus cooler.

11.title: Food Tour of Baja Sur, Mexico (Part 1)

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: After working up an appetite SCUBA diving and snorkeling, Stephanie takes some time off to explore the region's cuisine in San Jose and Cabo San Lucas, Mexico including a coconut hut, tequila tasting, farm tour, and a visit to a chocolate clam shack.

13.title: Pop Star and Grilled Salmon & Papaya Sandwiches in Orange County

episode of.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: After years of working in the music industry, Stephanie finally records a song of her own song! She shows her vocal coach and audio engineer some love by making sandwiches from their favorite fish, wild salmon. Prior to the recording session, she meets with her stylist to find a new look and prepares the fish at a local beach!

locations: San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur, Mexico::(location)
La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico::(location)
Los Cabos, Baja California Sur, Mexico::(location)
imdb.plot outline: Say goodbye to boring cooking shows, this one's got it all wrapped up into one posh package! Join series host and seafood enthusiast, Stephanie Harris-Uyidi, as she travels to exotic locations to take on new adventures and create fabulous pescatarian meals using local seafood and ingredients. She also does a bit of shopping along the way! In each episode, Stephanie travels to a new location to participate in an exciting adventure. The activities range from extreme to relaxing - a flying trapeze lesson in Las Vegas, surfing big waves in San Diego and snowshoeing in Yosemite to name a few. Prior to each adventure, she shops for her outfit at a local shop. This could result in a trip to an Indian tailor for a colorful sari, a surf shop for a custom wet suit or a quaint boutique for a chic sailing cap. She then seeks out the perfect ingredients for the seafood meal that she'll make for her instructor. From upscale farmers markets, posh seafood houses to organic farms, Stephanie finds the best local fare available.
imdb.title: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure!
akas: The Posh Pescatarian: Appetite for Adventure! (United States)
plot: Stephanie travels to a new location to participate in an exciting adventure and makes a seafood meal for her instructor.::Stephanie Harris-Uyidi
